scripts.build:xterm: mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/xterm-entry.js --bundle --minify --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/xterm.bundle.js --format=iife --global-name=TerminalBundle --define:process.env.NODE_ENV="production" && cp node_modules/@xterm/xterm/css/xterm.css dist/xterm.css
scripts.build:xterm:split: mkdir -p dist/esm && esbuild src/xterm-entry.js --bundle --minify --splitting --format=esm --outdir=dist/esm --target=es2020 --define:process.env.NODE_ENV="production" && cp node_modules/@xterm/xterm/css/xterm.css dist/esm/xterm.css
